steps.title: Type 'Turn windows features on or off' in the search box, and click enter.
steps.content: Type 'Turn windows features on or off' in the search box, and click enter.

steps.title: A dialog box appears.
steps.content: A dialog box appears. In the dialog box, look for telnet client and turn it on. Click ok.

steps.title: Wait for the applied changes to be completed.
steps.content: Wait for the applied changes to be completed.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. You will be connected to Telehack. Now you can enter any command in the command line.

steps.title: Go to playstore and download a telnet ssh client or terminal emulator.
steps.content: Go to playstore and download a telnet ssh client or terminal emulator.

steps.title: Open the emulator and type telnet telehack.com.
steps.content: Open the emulator and type telnet telehack.com.

steps.title: You will be connected to Telehack.
steps.content: You will be connected to Telehack.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. You will be connected to Telehack. Keep in mind that Telehack was primarily developed to be used with telnet and thus the browser version of Telehack may be unstable.
